Question
========
The SPSS output below of the reliability analysis for the Negative Fear of Failure scale is based on data from the Performance Motivation Test for Children (PMTK). 


![](uu-Cronbach's-alpha-008-nl-tabel.jpg)
  
Suppose you need to shorten the test, which of the four items listed is first eligible to be removed from the scale?  
Answerlist
----------
* Item 14
* Item 11
* Item 2
* None of these items

Solution
========
  

Answerlist
----------
* By removing item 14, Cronbach's Alpha would get lower. Is that what you want?
* By removing item 11, Cronbach's Alpha would get lower. Is that what you want?
* By removing item 2, Cronbach's Alpha would get lower. Is that what you want?
* Good
